messages.subject: what the neighbors think
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/12/02 4:10:54 PM, ecsamhill@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/12/02 4:10:54 PM, ecsamhill@... writes:

<< We've read here about some kids who really start bursting with mental
energy after 10pm.
Many neighbors wouldn't be visiting at that time of day to see that
happening. (Although
the worst kind of neighbor might notice how late in the morning the kids
are found in
their pajamas.)
>>


Pajamas?

Still in their clothes from the night before, at our house! <g>

I've told the kids that after 10:00 at night they need to be quiet enough not
to irritate the neighbors. I'm sure some of my neighbors know my boys are
up playing games sometimes at 3:30 or 4:00 a.m., or they see the computer
flicker through the window of my office (which is upstairs, but you can see
the light changing).

Sandra
